subject: Golf
British Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Duval, the former world No. 1 who has spent more time in the broadcast booth than on the course recently, shot a five-under-par 67 at the Old Course and survived the cut for only the second time in his past 14 starts.
snippet: Duval, the former world No. 1 who has spent more time in the broadcast booth than on the course recently, shot a five-under-par 67 at the Old Course and survived the cut for only the second time in his past 14 starts.
